articles.description: Egyptian swimmer Omar Sayed Shaaban soared to success when he set a new record for the highest jump out of water while wearing a monofin.

articles.author: Pure Xbox
articles.title: Feature: 30 Xbox Series X Games To Look Forward To In 2021 - Pure Xbox
articles.description: The best games coming to Xbox Series X|S (and Xbox One) in 2021
articles.content: As we continue into 2021 with our shiny new consoles (or preparing to buy one, or maybe even sticking with the Xbox One!), we have a long list of games awaiting us that have our hearts racing in exci… [+657 chars]
